Quest

Class Quest

  • java.lang.Object
    • Quest.Quest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ItemQuest, KillingQuest

    public abstract class Quest
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A abstract class providing basic quest methods and variables. It will keep track of how many parts of the quest is done, if its started and whether the reward has been recieved.
    Version:
    2013-02-18
    Author:
    Johan
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
